sections.text:
37-709.Game refuges; violation; penalty.

Any person who violates any of the provisions of section 37-708 shall be guilty of a Class III misdemeanor.

SourceLaws 1939, c. 43, § 4, p. 202;C.S.Supp.,1941, § 37-431;R.S.1943, § 37-421;Laws 1947, c. 135, § 5, p. 380;Laws 1977, LB 40, § 187;Laws 1993, LB 235, § 21;R.S.1943, (1993), § 37-421;Laws 1998, LB 922, § 323.
